bns.title: What is BNS?
bns.introduction: BNS – or blockchain name system – is the protocol on the internet that turns human-comprehensible decentralized website names such as ‘yourwebsite.bch’ or ‘mywebsite.eth’ into addresses understandable by decentralized network machines.

identity.title: human-readable identity
identity.introduction: The concise universal gateway to your crypto assets, branding and business logic in the decentralized world.

proof.title: Proof of Adoption
introduction: Portal Network’s mission is to enable both technical & non-technical users to easily deploy/host/connect/use ÐWebs & ÐApps so that blockchain technology can achieve its full potential. Your support and adoption is essential to the execution of this vision.
Proof of Adoption provides both blockchain and crypto community a series of tools to effortlessly interact and contribute their unique talents to the decentralized world.

chapter.title: Non-technical Users Adoption
chapter.introduction: Mumei is designed for users to have seamless experience when using decentralized solutions such as BNS management, digital asset management, and decentralized websites utilization.

chapter.title: Technical Users Adoption
chapter.introduction: Kaizen empowers users to learn, build, deploy, and manage decentralized applications or decentralized web services with their native languages, participation of hackathons, CLI, frameworks, and monitoring systems.
